description: This file contains utility functions for filesystem operations, including recursive directory removal, deleting files in a directory, and deleting a path from the filesystem.

methods.name: rmdir_recursive
methods.description: Recursively deletes a directory and its contents, returning True if successful.

methods.name: delete_files_in_dir
methods.description: Deletes all files and subdirectories within a specified directory without deleting the directory itself.

methods.name: delete_from_fs
methods.description: Deletes a file or directory from the filesystem, returning True if successful.
